tasks.label: Auto Git Commit and Push
tasks.command: git add .; git commit -m 'Auto-commit'; git push origin main

linux.command: git add . && git commit -m "$(date +%F) Auto-commit" && git push origin main

osx.command: git add . && git commit -m "$(date +%F) Auto-commit" && git push origin main

windows.command: git add . && git commit -m "$(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd') Auto-commit" && git push origin main
